3. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council
====================

The City of Plainview is governed by a Mayor and City Council who are elected by the people of the city. The Mayor and City Council acting together are the governing body. All governing body members serve four year terms. The governing body, being the elected representatives of the people, adopts all ordinances and resolutions, and determines the general goals and policies.

Meetings
--------

* 6:30 pm
* Second and fourth Tuesday of each month
* City Hall  
  202 W. 5th St.  
  Plainview, TX 79072

* 11:30 am
* Thursday preceding second and fourth Tuesday of each month
* City Hall  
  202 W. 5th St.  
  Plainview, TX 79072

Members
-------

* [Charles Starnes](https://www.plainviewtx.org/89/Mayor "Wendell Dunlap"), Mayor  
  Term expires May 2028
* [Mary Elizabeth Dickerson](https://www.plainviewtx.org/90/District-1 "Nelda VanHoose"), District 1 Representative  
  Term expires May 2026
* [Steve Martinez](https://www.plainviewtx.org/91/District-2 "Larry A. Williams"), District 2 Representative  
  Term expires May 2026
* [Gilbert Garcia](https://www.plainviewtx.org/92/District-3), District 3 Representative  
  Term expires May 2026

* [Gary House](https://www.plainviewtx.org/93/District-4 "Teressa King"), District 4 Representative  
  Term expires May 2026
* [Daniel Rascon](https://www.plainviewtx.org/94/District-5 "Shane Martinez"), District 5 Representative  
  Term expires May 2028
* [Evan Weiss](https://tx-plainview2.civicplus.com/95/District-6), District 6 Representative  
  Term expires May 2028
* [Lorie Rodriguez](https://www.plainviewtx.org/96/District-7 "Oliver Aldape"), District 7 Representative  
  Term expires May 2028
